ingredients.item: 2 rashers essential Waitrose Smoked Back Bacon, chopped
400g pack frozen essential Waitrose Cooked Seafood Selection, defrosted

instructions.step: Put the bacon into a wide non-stick pan. Fry from cold for 3 minutes until the fat runs. Add the leeks and cook for 3 minutes more until the leeks are soft.

Stir in the flour, cook for 1 minute, then gradually stir in the milk until smooth. Add the sweetcorn and seafood and slowly bring to a simmer for 10 minutes or until the soup is silky and the seafood is piping hot. Season and serve with soda bread.
